headline: PPG again recognized on Newsweek’s ‘Most Trusted Companies in America 2025’ list
summary: PITTSBURGH, March 28, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced its inclusion in Newsweek’s list of Most Trustworthy Companies in America for the second straight year, recognizing its high evaluations in customer, investor and employee trust.

headline: 2 Dividend Kings To Grow Your Income
summary: Consistency in dividend growth investing can be a crucial piece of an income investor's goals. Discover 2 reliable dividend kings excelling in consistent growth.
